channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: In a new poll, 1 in 5 Americans report having poor mental health

item.title: Rising temperatures could have a chilling impact on young children
item.description: A study points to a new concern about the effect that heat can have on young children.

item.title: Scientists use AI to help make bionic hands work better for people who need them
item.description: Scientists are using artificial intelligence to make bionic limbs act more like natural ones.

item.title: The VA is making it harder for male veterans with breast cancer to get care

item.title: Listen to the Latest ‘KFF Health News Minute’
item.description: The "KFF Health News Minute” brings original health care and health policy reporting from our newsroom to the airwaves each week.
